Suppose I have an Excel table called "numbers" that contains the following data:
| ID | Value |
|----|-------|
| 1  | 5     |
| 2  | 2     |
| 3  | 8     |
| 4  | 17    |
I want to find the sum of all the numbers in the "Value" column. What SQL query should I use to achieve this?

To find the sum of all the numbers in the "Value" column of the table called "numbers," you can use the SQL `SUM()` function. Here is the SQL query you would use:

```sql
SELECT SUM(Value) AS TotalValue
FROM numbers;
```

This query will calculate the sum of all values in the "Value" column and return it as "TotalValue."
